entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 this morning then steady. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 3 this morning then steady. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
